title: eSports - Volume 2
description: 15 unique energetic music backgrounds with a modern, uplifting and motivating mood ideal for your games.
longDescription:
Preview on Youtube


eSports - Volume 2 is the second collection of 15 unique energetic music backgrounds with a modern, uplifting and motivating mood ideal for sports, racing and any team games.

Enjoy the challenge through complete music kits made of full length, multiple loops, intro, outro and shorter edits!


Cannonball Full length (01:58), 19 Loops, 5 Edits

Fire Me Up Full length (01:33), 13 Loops, 5 Edits

Just Fine Full length (01:32), 13 Loops, 5 Edits

Mass Training Full length (01:23), 9 Loops, 5 Edits

Neon Car Full length (01:36), 12 Loops, 5 Edits

No Speed Limit Full length (01:58), 8 Loops, 5 Edits

Phire Phonk Full length (01:46), 10 Loops, 5 Edits

Phonk Attitude Full length (01:25), 15 Loops, 5 Edits

Phonky Full length (01:35), 8 Loops, 5 Edits

Recharge Full length (01:36), 12 Loops, 6 Edits

Sonic Crack Full length (01:40), 9 Loops, 5 Edits

Still Dancing Full length (01:27), 9 Loops, 6 Edits

Take My Heart Full length (01:38), 13 Loops, 5 Edits

Tough Game Full length (01:50), 12 Loops, 5 Edits

Tuning Reality Full length (01:24), 8 Loops, 6 Edits


Take a look: Total Game Music Collection - 500 High Quality music themes ideal for any game!

Look at the first eSports collection: eSports - Volume 1


This pack is produced by Luca Tomassini a composer with more than 20 years of expertise in music production with multiple TV, feature films and multimedia placements.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Full length tracks: 15
  •  Loops: 170
  •  Edits: 45
  • Intro 17
  • Outro 16


Number of Audio Wavs: 263

Number of Audio Cues: 263

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 1h, 42m, 24s

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes


﻿- Terms of Usage and Licensing Notes outside the game engine.

All packages by Frequently Asked Music are meant to be used within Unreal Engine. Please contact us at studio@frequentlyaskedmusic.com for further clearance in case you want to use a specific track for other purposes - YouTube videos, social marketing, promo.
